https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/teFnZW7XMF59mujfbkA8iLZR1sZ.jpg Miharu, who returned to Japan due to sudden company bankruptcy, finds a letter in an empty room after a long absence. With memories of his old lover in his heart, Miharu heads north on a motorbike, relying on the letter. While riding a motorcycle, Miharu meets a man who has an 8mm camera that his former lover had. 8mm Inside Me
